ygData.subject: New To EQ and have a problem.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, I d just like to say I finally bought EQ after everyone at my work, and all my friends have made me sick about raving about it.  Well, I m in a
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

I'd just like to say I finally bought EQ after everyone at my work,
and all my friends have made me sick about raving about it. Well, I'm
in a little bit of a bind.

I just started out and died when I finally reached my Guild house.
Unfortunately I couldn't get my corpse and have lost my note I was
supposed to hand to the necromancer there. I hear from my friends
that I should get a robe or something, but I don't have the note. Is
there any way to get a new note or something? None of the stores
nearby will sell me anything because I'm a necromancer, so I'd like to
get this one. Also is there anything else I am missing out on by
not completing this quest? I mean, I'm sure I can eventually find a
robe somewhere, I just don't want to miss out on a bunch of stuff.

Thanx
===
,,
Shaithis
,,
